section.name: About Mr Maven
section.p: Mr Maven provides a system for cybermanagement of Maven that's a convenience and/or synthesis level "above" Maven, or a "meta" echelon. It uses focused regional approaches from a front-line "service desk" that encompasses abstract yet advanced optimizing parallelism. This in turn improves throughout in distributed workloads (optimized for Kubernetes or other contexts) with a single entry-point orchestration of a cross-platform organizational actuating hub.
